column4: hi all... i've buyed an ubuntu vps.. i want install a psybnc on it but... gcc is not in the server... and apt get not found... how i can solve?
hi all... i've buyed an ubuntu vps.. i want install a psybnc on it but... gcc is not in the server... and apt get not found... how i can solve?
What release of Ubuntu is it running?
you aren't running Ubuntu there. You need to talk to your VPS provider.
